welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elmont, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily services international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is currently closed for renovations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and busiest at JFK, servicing both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by JetBlue airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal is used by several international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal is used by American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, JetBlue, and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines and other Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
